title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\BatchTranslateDocumentMetadata
name: BatchTranslateDocumentMetadata
description:
State metadata for the batch translation operation.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.BatchTranslateDocumentMetadata

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: __construct
methods.description: Constructor.

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.state
params.description: The state of the operation.

params.name: data.total_pages
params.description: Total number of pages to translate in all documents so far. Documents without clear page definition (such as XLSX) are not counted.

params.name: data.translated_pages
params.description: Number of successfully translated pages in all documents so far. Documents without clear page definition (such as XLSX) are not counted.

params.name: data.failed_pages
params.description: Number of pages that failed to process in all documents so far. Documents without clear page definition (such as XLSX) are not counted.

params.name: data.total_billable_pages
params.description: Number of billable pages in documents with clear page definition (such as PDF, DOCX, PPTX) so far.

params.name: data.total_characters
params.description: Total number of characters (Unicode codepoints) in all documents so far.

params.name: data.translated_characters
params.description: Number of successfully translated characters (Unicode codepoints) in all documents so far.

params.name: data.failed_characters
params.description: Number of characters that have failed to process (Unicode codepoints) in all documents so far.

params.name: data.total_billable_characters
params.description: Number of billable characters (Unicode codepoints) in documents without clear page definition (such as XLSX) so far.

params.name: data.submit_time
params.description: Time when the operation was submitted.
